Paragraph.Text: Found around 65m under the surface and below, Iron Ore can be smelted into Iron Bars using the smelter. Iron Bars are used in a wide variety of machines.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left:
Occurrence: Couleur Ping: 1ère Etape de l'Extraction: 2ème Etape de l'Extraction:
1ère Etape de Fonte: 2ème Etape de Fonte:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right:
-65 to -850m Red-Orange Build Gun MK1 Ore Extractor
